name: Sophia_Vixen
review: My favorite type of lipstick is anything from Matte selection. This is truly matte and is a fun color. How ever, the texture looks odd once applied. It makes your lips looked chapped even if they aren't. I even tried applying lip balm before using the lipstick and still got the same effect. If the formula was different this lipstick would be a great dupe for department store brands, but unfortunately it has the grade quality of the average drugstore brand.

name: AbyDavenport
review: I got the shade in Nude Attitude however the color was not what I was expecting.  Too light looked like I was sick with noooo lips. It wears off too fast. Did not like it, maybe another color could be better. Don't know.

name: Jumbo
review: I have been looking for the perfect nude lipstick for a while and then I was introduced to Nude Attitude. I thought it was perfect! The only thing I didn't like was it wore off really easily... But other than that, I would recommend it for anybody. And, the price is right!

name: KPEP10
review: Bought this color because it looks just like Mac's cream D' nude lipstick. The color goes on just like Mac, but after about 20 mins check your lips because the color ends up at the corners of your mouth! You have to reapply often to keep the color on lips.

name: Colby Dane
review: I actually bought this as a Christmas present for my best friend because I loved it so much and she said that she loved it on me!

name: krlrmrz
review: ive been searching for this lipstick & i loved it :D the color lasted all night with the help of lip liner. ah it made me feel soo fancy

name: Jane
review:
Purchased #006 matte red. Great color that goes on smoothly and looks great alone or with clear or red gloss on top.

If you've been searching for a red that doesn't go pink as it wears off or when you wear just a little bit, this is a fantastic choice.

name: Stef Cue
review: True to color! Can't get enough... I get compliments everytime I go out!!

name: kcoto
review: great color and since they are a fraction of the cost you can buy way more and try out different looks

name: Sall2032
review: I liked the matte-ness of this lipstick, but I thought I would have a more bright orange color than this. Good lipstick, just not the color I was expecting

name: Christina
review:
I bought this after watching tutorials on YouTube and hearing all of the hype. I don't wear lipstick EVER but I thought I'd try this. I LOVE IT! Yes, as other reviews said it is clumpy, and settles into the lines of your lips. You must not have dry lips, use chapstick under it, and if you want a shine instead of the matte look, wear lip gloss over it. Overall, it's the first lipstick I've really loved.

I bought it in "Nude Attitude"

name: wendigoal
review: I had not bought a matte lipstick before so I wasn't sure what to expect. It is creamier than I expected; not too dry, although drier than most traditional, more glossy lipsticks. But I guess that's the point. I got it in "Really Red," so it's probably more suited to a special occasion / going out for most people, but I tend to wear bold red lipstick a lot anyway, so I use it for everyday as well. My concern with buying red lipsticks is they can tend to go too bright on me. This one is pretty true to what you see in the tube. It stays in place pretty well. The only reason I didn't rate it "perfect" is because I haven't tried any other matte lipsticks so I have nothing to compare it to.

name: Tay
review: It gives a great base to a lip gloss, and looks natural.

name: Kendra_CD
review:
I wear this every day now and it adds a very natural look to the lips without the shine.
And it would also be a very nice selection to add for the unisex male users.

name: queen
review: I love this lipstick! although it's not that bright of a pink i still love it.

name: Rosa
review: It looked like a pretty soft pink, but I would have liked a more saturating lipstick with more creaminess.  My lips felt dry and looked kind of hum drum

name: ultashopper
review: the quality was great, but the color was a little different than shown on the tube. Was not flattering for me.

name: DollFace
review: The color settles in the creases of my lips. It's pretty clumpy, and doesn't look smooth once it's on.

name: sugarcookie90
review: A great product

name: jesenia
review: very good product

name: ktadastra
review: If you have medium to tan skin, then this light peachy shade will look great on you. It's a bit drying, but it's a matte shade for God's sake. All in all, Revlon makes great lip products.

name: Vicky
review: I purchased Revlon Matte Lipstick in the past [pink pout, sky pink] I really loved these lipsticks their true to color but some can be a little drying and you have to apply lip gloss over it. I recently purchased Smoky Peach, Nude attitude, and Stormy Pink there awesome ! Nude attitude is more for light/medium toned. Stormy Pink and Smoky Peach can vary. Definitely will purchase more in the future*

name: 11 Shells
review: Everyday lipstick, discontinued for a while, so glad it is back!

name: Jude
review: Daytime use.

name: Aida
review:
I got this lipstick yesterday and I already love it! I love the nude lipstick look and this is a great pick. It's a matte style, so if you want a little shine, put a dab of lipgloss on and it looks perfect!

It looks a little orangey in the picture, but it isn't. I was worried at first when I bought it but very pleased with the color when it arrived.

name: Joyfriendz
review: Good dupe for MAC Kinda Sexy lipstick, but is a bit more peach toned.  Doesn't last as long as MAC, but is creamier and less drying.  Color is not Mauve at all despite its name. More of a peachy-pink nude.

name: MarshaS
review: This is my lips but better...Love this color!!

name: Elliphant
review: I was looking for a nude to go with my very, very pale skin so I bought nude attitude, not really knowing the color I was going to get. Mistake! My lips are very red naturally, so it wore like orange on me. My lips are also dry, and the application was so uneven that it emphasized all the dry and cracked spots. I tried mixing it with other lipsticks and lip glosses but nothing worked. By far one of the worst lipsticks in my collection.

name: Shipra
review: Smoked Peach is one of most lovely lip color in my stash! I love the matte finish, smooth and even application, the warm peachy shade and the overall performance of this lip color. it certainly is my most picked lip color!

name: kat
review: I didn't like this matte lipstick at all when applying it's over drying on my lips I have to have a nice smooth sheer lipstick if I want it to really stick on my lips not buying anymore of these.

name: Olha
review: it has a strange smell. but I like the color

name: Samantha723
review: I have this in pink pout, it was highly recommended by youtube vloggers. When I put it on I noticed it built up on dry spots on my lips, so make sure to exfoliate them before using. I also didn't use a lip liner, and it definitly feathered. I don't own any lip liners so I'll definitly need to get one because I love this lip product. The color is great on it's own or layer with other similar colors.

name: Genevieve
review: I love the velvet finish of this lipstick and the color sky pink is so pretty. But I really don't like it that it's way too dry on my lisps!! This one may be used sometime in summer or when the weather is more like humid. Anyway it worth the price.

name: Hannah
review: Love this pop of color for an everyday look! This lipstick made me become obsessed with corals!

name: Brianna
review: I love the color especially with brown tone eye shadows. It does tend to wear off.

name: Jvang
review: This is my favorite color from Revlon's Matte line. It has the perfect neutral lip color. My lips are naturally dark and so I have a hard time finding neutral to nude lip wear and this lipstick gives me the exact color I want. Was very happy when I found it at Ulta because I can't find it anywhere anymore.

name: Zauthentic4
review: I am medium brown skin African American and bought stormy pink. It looks great on darker skin tones. I love matte lipcolor!

name: Drea
review: I got this in Smoky Peach. It's too light for me unfortunately, but I can wear it lightly at least or mix or layer. Revlon lipsticks are great for the price. They're pigmented and high quality for drugstore makeup.

name: Plain Jane
review: I've been trying to get out of my box and use trendy colors but alas my neutral/classic look always wins. I've been eyeing this color for awhile and finally bought it. It's a pretty pink that can be used at any time. I used a lip primer and a NYX lip liner along with it to help it last longer.

name: The Makeup Fiend
review: Although the color I bought at this purchase didn't end up looking good on me, I love this brand. I just need to stick with reds!

name: My4LoveBeans
review: I bought this lipstick for my daughter and it looks beautiful on her. It is the perfect soft pink color. I am really picky about the colors she wears because she is 16. It complements her and looks like a natural soft pink color. It is long lasting and she has no complaints about it.

name: Macasnap
review: I was looking for a blue red, not an orange red.  This was the perfect RED!

name: Desi
review: I loved this color, it was the perfect color pink for my skin tone.  Thank you, ULTA....

name: WalkAwayRenee
review: I've been through so many red lipsticks. Many of them, for whatever reason, turn either too pink or too brown on my lips. So when I want a true red lip, I've resolved to mixing corals/oranges with the reds I have that don't work straight from the tube. Then...I found this color! It's a perfect slightly warm, vintage red that doesn't turn pink on me. The formula is great too; glides on easily, blends well, and has pretty good staying power. Out of all the MAC,Kat Von D, and Lime Crime I've been trying...the one that works best for me is Revlon. Love it when that happens!

name: Biz
review: This lipstick has a matte finish which looks really classy. I have fuller lips but this color doesn't make me look like a clown. Great buy!

name: Sue
review: Pretty color, but this was way too drying for my lips.

name: Jane
review: I was first wary of the color because I always pictured "mauve" as having purple, lilac or violet tones. This is actually kind of a neutral taupe - a pink-peach brown with warm undertones. It looks darker in the tube than on your skin or swatched. Considering this is a light and nude shade, you actually get good pigmentation, plus this applies smooth and not too drying. Love this shade, a perfect lips-but-better for me. Here's my in-depth review if anyone is interested: http://www.jellobeans.com/2014/07/revlon-matte-lipstick-in-mauve-it-over-review.html

name: Girlie
review: it feels to sheer on the lips ?? enough to be a matte lip stick..

name: KrzTexan
review: I've tried to keep giving the Revlon lipsticks chances. The last three I've purchased have broken on me ! It's always at the base '& it's annoying. I try to make them work because I feel if I try to return it , they won't. So I don't even bother and don't bother to even try. :(

name: peace1089
review: There is nothing good about this product. Maybe other colours are better, but I bought Pink Sky, and it is simply awful. I'm throwing it away. It can't even cover the colour of my light pink lips! You can't layer it either because it doesn't go in the crevasses of your lips, so it practically looks like vertical stripes down your lips. I tried blanking out my lips with concealer first (this works with all my other lipsticks to make them look brighter) but it just rubbed it off! Boy, was I mad. This is the WORST lipstick that I have ever bought, period.

name: anniieesays
review: Matte formulas are usually drying so I put a balm first and rub a coat or two of the pink pout on.  I reapply about two-three times throughout a 12 hour span.  The color stains your lips a bit so reapplication isn't always necessary.  Even when I do reapply I use my fingers to just add a bit more color back on and it also helps since the formula is somewhat drying.  By using my fingers I find that my lips wont flake.

name: BeautyBella
review:
I love it!
This is a great collection from Revlon!
The colors are perfect, matte finish, excellent lipstick!

name: babyphatgoddess81
review: i always liked matte lippies....i usually bought them from mac...then i discoverd that revlon carried it...and i was hooked...the colors are beautiful. i bought every color that was in stock!

name: beauty guru
review:
Chapped my lips, terrible color!
DO NOT BUY!!

name: Becca
review: This looked like I smeared foudation on my lips. It was cakey and the color didn't fill. I tried moisturizing capstick first but the lipstick didnt blend at all. I looked like a clown!

name: Disappointed Diva
review: I did not like this lipstick at all.. had no color at all. it made my lips look pale and like they didnt exist.. love mauve it over but not nude attitude

name: Revlon Lover
review: I like this lipstick a lot didnt think I would still its a matte lipstick. only thing I dont like about it is the way it taste.. beautiful colors and stays true. not a bad buy either great price especially when you have the buy one get one free sale.

name: Jacquelyn
review:
The pictures ULTA has online does NOT match the color in person. I recommend that you go into the store itself to check out the color selection.

Anyways, I bought this in Mauve it Over. I had a golden skin tone with a sort of brown undertone and it looks very nude on me, which I like! My lips have a mauve color with violet undertones and it gets rid of the sickly violet undertones. I have to reapply the lipstick every two hours, but it's not that bad. If you have dry lips, I don't really recommend this product to you because it will really show off every little flake and crack! And don't apply chapstick as a "base" because it'll turn the lipstick into a dewy one. Just wash your lips with warm water and exfoliate with a towel, and you should be fine!

name: Tiff
review: Love this lipstick. If you are looking for a true nude color, this lipstick will satisfy you completely.

name: hellokitty
review: goes on smooth and blends in well, good for day and night looks very sexy when on..i wish i purchased  this a long time ago

name: The Purple Haired Girl
review: I love this product. I will buy more colors!

name: kelyy
review: Very moisturizing and love the color

name: P.rod
review: this product comes off very chalky on your lips and it is not moistourizing at all

name: Kyleigh
review: I've had this for a long time and it's still not gone! It does dry my lips out a little, but if you apply chapstick before it doesn't dry them out! It says matte but it's fairly shiny. The color is great, I've actually only bought nude attitude. The best nude lip I've ever tried. I will come back to this always :)

name: Shea Tek
review: Bought this in nude attitude, and it is very cute! Other nude lipsticks were way too peachy and weird, but this is a great colour; just what I hoped for. My only complaint is that it wears off a bit easily (especially compared to other Revlon lipsticks) but other than than, it is pretty good!

name: Pdas
review: I love it in the colors - Cocoa Craving, Mauve it Over. I would recommend using a lip balm under or over this, since these can feel a little drying.Overall, I love the colors, and would be repurchasing.

name: Roxy
review: Revlon matte lipstick in smoked peach is so amaaazing.  I consider this a dupe for MAC's ravashing. I love that the Revlon matte lipsticks have no overpowering smell other lip products have. This looks good on fair skin and would look even better on darker skins.

name: Priscilla
review: I purchase the nude attitude, absolutely terrible it's like I'm applying concealer to my lips it's way to matte for my lips, my lips are usually soft but when I put this on it makes me look like a corpse it's terrible once again.

name: designerboyer
review: Love the Revlon matte lipsticks!  I now have 4 colors in this formula and they have amazing pigmentation and staying power.  I usually apply a gloss on top but I feel the matte formula helps it stay on longer.

name: euribe
review: I purchased this matte lipstick (my first matte) in "Wine Not" and I love the color pay off. I read on blogs and watched on video blogs that it will dry out your lips but I still love this color and how it looks. Great for the price and I love Revlon. Love it.

name: See
review: Love this lipstick!!!!!!

name: Sarah
review: This is truly a classic red lipstick. The color is very saturated and I love the matte finish. It goes on smoothly and stays there. Comparable to prestige brands

name: kellbelle89
review: Great shade, love the matte application

name: Linzi7780
review: When trying to achieve the perfect nude lip I I use this lipstick. I love Revlon colors. I have olive skin so I add a pinkish lip liner just on lines if my lips.

name: Anna
review: love the product but you definitely need to be tan to pull off the color

name: Baybeeboo
review: GREAT COLOR FOR ANY SKIN TYPE!

name: Nailpolishfreak
review: I love Revlon's Matte finished lipsticks! The colors are great, Nude attitude is my absolute favorite, I have like 5 of them. I recently bought Pink Pout and have noticed that it's an exact dupe of MACs snob!! Worth the money!

name: Bananas
review: I like the color selection revlon offers. Don't like how easily it wears off, also don't like how it doesn't hydrate my lips. Doesn't matter how much chapstick I put on before, my lips always look dry.

name: Natie82
review: Lovely packaging love that its matte

name: Edub
review: Wonderful red!

name: Mandie
review: Love the color! It last and doesn't rub off easy.

name: Chromi
review: This is an everyday subtle lipstick color. I like to focus on my eyes when I go out though so it's a perfect peachy pink color that compliments heavy eye makeup.

name: Jess
review: The perfect red lipstick it's a creamy matte lipstick that is beautiful. I love it!!!!!

name: Pam
review: I Love Revlon lip color! No gross taste. Beautiful colors. I am hooked on Primrose too!

name: suraiya
review:
I bought this product as I am a big fan of Matt lipsticks. The color from outside of the packaging looked really pretty.
However as I applied it, I could see this product does not go with its name. It is a very mild pink and looks very cheap.
I could not find anything good about this particular lipstick.

name: PNWPretty
review: I bought this lipstick in the color really red. It looks amazing for the first couple of hours, but unless you wear lip liner, it can start to lose the defined line around the border of your lips and leak and look smudgy. As with most lipsticks, avoid eating anything oily, because it'll wipe right off. Also, once it's been on for a few hours without reapplication, the matte texture begins to look almost chalky, which is kind of an unpleasant effect. But the color is classic and it applies really well!

name: Tina
review:
Natural matte color leaves your lips with color and no shine
Lips look natural !

name: RxLisa
review: I think darker colors look better in matte.  The coverage is not really even enough in the lighter color.  I have a couple tubes of this formulation, but darker colors and I like them a lot.

name: Lina
review: I love this product it give this nice moisturizer.. I can not live with out it.. Is like a chapstick.. love it love it..

name: Marie
review: Purchased this as a very close dupe to Mac's Russian Red. Beautiful color and amazing smooth/matte formula. I love it

name: Maria
review: use for daily wear

name: CAROL
review:
Use it daily, love the shades, mauvey, blue reds, keeps lips from feeling dry, Always have compliments on how well it stays on. Love it!
Love ityou made some with gold round tubes, and a set for dressing table.
Want more travel size, or some in flat tubes to easily carry in billfold.

name: KB
review: I love this color for the summer!

name: Abs
review: I got this because I couldn't find the nude shade I wanted in any other brand. The color and low price are the only things this lipstick has going for it. The color looked different on my lips and the application was clumpy and uneven. I'll probably continue using it, but that's because I'm cheap. I'll look for something else when it runs out.

name: Magpie
review: Okay, so I did a lot of research/review reading before I purchased this lipstick in the shade Nude Attitude, knowing the good and the bad about it. For the good price though, I decided to go for it. It cannot/should not be used as a normal lipstick because it WILL make you look like you just rose from dead (the color payoff is very strong). However, you can still use it to achieve a subtle nude lip. I usually put lip balm on first and rub it into my lips very well. Then I take the lipstick and DAB it on very lightly so there's only a hint of nude. Afterwards I'll usually top it off with a gloss and rub that in, then get rid of the excess stuff. Yes, it's a lot of work, but the look is pretty much worth it. It's the only nude lipstick I've purchased so far so I'm planning on making it work! :D So buyer, beware of the effort for this shade/lipstick.. ya gotta know what you're doing with this one.

name: elmah5
review: I like this lipstick because it is long wearing and when it wears off I still have a sheer wash of color on my lips!  Very nice, not to bright red!

name: Tori the Minimalist
review: Love the color which is long lasting but it accentuates my lip lines even though it is not drying. I'd never use them without a gloss which helps offset the chalkiness. Kind of defeats the purpose I originally bought them for. I tried using a primer but my lips peel a lot so it didn't really help.

name: Peridot
review: I bought the Really Red. I am Asian with warm undertones and the shade of red is perfect! Just make sure you exfoliate before putting on this matte lipstick. Great product!

name: Andi
review: It's pretty drying but I apply a chapstick first before I do any of my makeup. The lips are the last thing I do so when it comes time to use this lipstick, my lips are moisturized enough that this goes on smoother, more even, and looks more natural. I top it off w/ the Peachy Keen (I think??) lipgloss by Revelon as well. Great combo for trendy nude lips.

name: MSE
review: I liked the color, but not the texture. This goes on well over top other colors, but the texture of it alone is too drying. I like matte lipsticks, but this one is just way too dry to the point where the color sits in every crack on your lip and dissipates before you know it. Does not go on smoothly by itself.

name: Kacie209
review: I have been looking for that perfect pink lip color for-ev-er... and came across this one (Pink Pount) after looking at reviews for brands like MAC, etc. I like it... it's a pink, but not a bright pink. I apply a couple layers and then put a nice pink gloss over it - fabulous! I now carry one in my purse, along with the one in my make up.

name: Anna Yvonne
review: I wore this matte red for lipstick for my first time ever wearing lipstick and it worked out awesome. I loved the way it felt. I felt like a million bucks. :)

name: Faithfulcocoa
review: I have used this shade as it is closest to Fawn 09 by Revlon. Have been using it for 3 years now and its my all time favorite shade.

name: apyy
review: I love this color, perfect pale pink If I can't find a color I know this color will always work no matter what

name: Legs101
review: Revlon created a wonderful matte line that is inexpensive, however the look is far from cheap. This lipstick comes in an array of colors with awesome pigments. The color I wear has some blue in it to brighten my teeth even more.

name: Kimmylou
review: This is a good lipstick for a natural look - nude lip with no color. Works well with a clear gloss.

name: annu
review: they need to more  bring more colors in matte lipsticks

name: Snooks
review: Love the color, it doesn't clump or get sticky. It's smooth and goes on well. Love it!

name: Steph
review: really like this product. it gave me the effect i was looking for at an inexpensive price

name: lipstick lover
review: I will always buy Revlon.. my fave drugstore brand.

name: Roxanne
review: Love this Lipstick!!!

name: MissMcCarthy
review: Just a notch beneath Uta, which is the best.

name: kml
review: I have bought 4 of these matte lipsticks and they are amazing! For a drugstore brand, they have really nice color payoff and are very rich and true to color. Like all matte lipsticks though, they are not the most moisturizing but if your lips are in good condition then you should be fine. If your lips are already dry I would not recommend these, at least not without applying some sort of lip balm underneath.  Revlon has done it again! Great Product!

name: Rose
review: i got this lipstick in Nude Attitude. my lips really aren't that dry. i exfoliate, and constantly apply chapstick. but when i put this on my lips, you could see EVERY SINGLE CREASE on my lips. i was horrified! i would never ever buy this again.

name: meg
review: I wanted a natural nude lip tone, this one's a little lighter in the shade than I wanted, but it looks great!

name: JeanBean
review: I was hoping to get the nude look on my lips but my lips looked "covered up", sort of like I used cover stick over my lips rather than lipstick.  Maybe I should have chose a glossy nude rather than matte.  Not sure.

name: Number 1 Lipstick
review: This is my second Revlon lipstick. I love them, the colors are amazing and the quality is like no other lipstick from the drugstore.

name: LadyDo1
review: Love the color & stays on during the work day

name: jadethecool
review: when they said nude attitude, i thought it would be more like a concealer color but it turns out that it has a bit of peach color in it also.. not that i don't like it, it's just not really true to what they were saying.

name: ComeU
review: This is my go to lipstick..it instantly adds freshness and brightens face

name: Eweaver
review: It looks super chalky going on and the minute you rub your lips together, the lipstick is gone. I have never experienced anything quite like it but it was an immediate return!

name: alburnangel
review: when i bought it i did not know it was a matte, dull color

name: Maggy
review: These are very pigmented and even though they are matte they are not drying at all!

name: Svetlana
review:
Great if you like that natural look. I had high expectations for this. When I applied it on to my lips, the application was a bit cakey and uneven, but I fixed that with applying a layer of chapstick before using this

Also, the color looks washed out by its' self on my lips, but once I applied clear gloss on top, the finish was great! love it!

name: llamamama
review: I have this in both Really Red and Nude Attitude...both are such great colors and look fantastic. Matte lipstick requires absolutely soft/smooth lips so make sure to get a lip exfoliating balm if you have winter lips. It does need re-application I would suggest putting on one layer setting w/powder and apply another layer to get lasting results.

name: Xiora
review: It's lovely and makes a striking impression. It does, however, wear off very easily.

name: Christine
review: Nude lips are always in, and I've been searching for a perfect nude shade to really blend my lips in, but I've been unsuccessful until I discovered Revlon's Nude Matte. The only problem was that it was very thin, so a few layers were needed in order to get the full nude effect. Also, IDK if it's just my lips, but they got all chapped from application. After the first few times, I just use it as a base, and spread another lipstick shade over it.

name: Alex
review: great colors for practically all skin types. All my friends and I look great in all the colors, which is rare because my skin is olive, closer to the yellow side than the green side. It is clumpy, but as long as you throw some chap stick on bottom or a touch of lip gloss on top you should be fine. I would buy this again, and that's a complement from me since I don't like Revlon products.

name: Makeup junkie
review: It's a bit too shimmery  for me

name: Chelse
review: Loved the smoked peach color- very pretty on fair skin with warm/yellow tones. Not as smooth as pricier brands, so rub a little balm on before you use. That's the bummer about matte lipsticks- they're chic but often drying

name: LadyofBagz
review: Have been on the hunt for this lipstick for a while, glad I found it on Ulta.com! Prefect nude shade for any skin tone, it is a must buy!

name: Zay
review: This is so unflattering. I don't mind that it's a matte and I understand that matte lipsticks can be drying, but this makes you look like a corpse with chapped lips even when they're not! I was disappointed with it, but Revlon does make some other matte lipsticks that are much better! I guess this one was just ... bad.

name: Kissable Lips
review: I love this color. It is very cute when I match it up with what I wear.

name: none
review:
Only tried it once and it was not the color I
expected.

name: Itsmeitene
review: I had been looking for the perfect peach lippi. The smoked peach meets my needs. Great with a green smokey eye

name: nanni
review: Goes on very chalky. Dries out lips and does not last long. Sorry not what I was looking for.

name: Cass
review: The lighter colors come off very chalky and do not look cute but the darker colors seem to be fine

name: Kikiss
review: I really like the color. And the matte finish.. I had tried other lipsticks and they made me look as if my lips were swollen (because i have thick lips) and this lipstick is JUST PERFECT!

name: Msjodeci
review: First time I've ever purchased red lipstick, and I love it!! Goes on smoothly with great coverage and last all day.

name: Arty Girl
review: The color is just what I wanted. I need to keep reapplying because it seems to wear off quickly.

name: tiffster
review: I love this matte pout lipstick.the best one.as it stays on and goes on smooth and even and doesn't dry lips. No clumps on smudging.great color for almost anyone.

name: Fran
review: I like the color and that it stays on for longer than a few hours.

name: Lindavanne
review: Best product.

name: Tammy E.
review: This color is not easy to find, it is matte so I put a lip gloss on top but it is a perfect nude if you're looking for one.

name: Kate
review: I have very fair skin so naturally its quite hard for me to find nude lip sticks.  I got nude adittude and it was to orangy for my skin so I had to but a pretty pigmented lip gloss over it to make it less orangy.  If you don't have super fair skin this could look really good though.

name: Zombie girl
review: I was dressing up as a pinup zombie for Halloween so I was looking for any matte lipstick I could find.  Well I found this one and tried it out as soon as I got in the car and have been in love with it since. I was surprised at how easily it went on and how bright the color showed up with one application.  I have never worn lipstick of any kind before but now I can't wait to build a collection of different shades!  The only downside of the Revlon brand is that it comes off really easily, it will show up on anything that touches my lips so I have to reapply often.  Also Revlon doesn't have a big selection of matte shades.

name: VanessaD84
review:
I did not love the Revlon HD Matte Lipstick in Nude Attitude as much as I wanted to. Ive always been unsure of the nude trend with my mostly fair skintone. I feel like the nude color is too close to my skin tone so it makes me look sick or something with my lips being the same shade as the rest of my face. It is a pretty subtle but I think I need a little more pink or some pigment in the lip color. If someone had a different skintone it might look better.
This post was sponsored by Revlon as part of a sampling activation for Crowdtap. I received complimentary products to facilitate my review.

name: Ariel
review: Not worth it. Looks cheap and has little to no pigment. Theres others way better

name: Steph
review: I wanted to try the natural look but it doesn't look right on me I'm too used to wearing pink shades so I'm not comfy in this color it looks like I have makeup on my lips

name: tomitheory
review: Is light pale orange and matte. Really shows up that way. Careful with this one. It can make you look younger though (all pale apricots usually make people look younger.)

name: LittleMissScareAll
review: I am normally not a matte lipstick person, but the color "Pink Pout" caught my attention and I bought it on a whim. I love how easily this applies. My lips are very flaky and dry in the winter (and I exfoliate several times a week!) and this lipstick did a great job of hiding that. It is full coverage and lasted a good 5 hours on me before *starting* to fade. I would purchase this again in other colors as well.

name: Pogm
review: Use on a daily basis, goes on smooth and long lasting

name: Miztl
review: Very nice color can be mixed with other colors from the same line. Not bad for the price.

name: Bella
review:
Not a great matte i found e.l.f double ended day to night duo lipstick much better and it was $5 bucks.
Not what i was looking for.

name: Chell
review: It was ok

name: Courtney
review: Smells like my grandma. Super drying. But an even colo

name: A
review: Lighter than I thought on me, but pretty!

name: SueH
review: I love this shade!  Have worn it for years.

name: Tina
review: Adds an extra pop of color.

name: Magic
review: Good product good coverage, last after applying, looks natural

name: Kensy
review: This is the best shade of red. It doesn't have an orange, or pink, or blue tones in it. It is a true red color. My only complaint is that it does need to be reapplied a few times a day. If I could find this color in a long last formula, it would be the perfect red lipstick.

name: The Heat
review: This is the go to lipstick. Perfect shade, true matte and long lastung. Everything a woman needs when wearing red lips. Received nothing but compliments. Get on it ladies!!

name: Trengy Girl
review: I love this lipstick

name: Ladybug
review: A little goes a long way.

name: Eli
review: Love it

name: Mickey
review: It's too light for me.

name: Jazzy
review: I love this color and it goes great with anything and you can wear this lipstick everyday if you like. I'm in love

name: Bgirl
review:
Pretty good! Didn't really like the color I picked out though! It was too pale pink for me!
But it was very true to color though and it did fell good on my lips! Very soft, smooth, creamy, and moisturizing!

name: Shakar'
review: If you are like me and was looking for that peachy coral look thi is the best lipstick ever, the color is beautiful!! I likey!!

name: Glamour Girl
review: I got this in Mauve It Over.  I had to look all over for this shade, and I can see why it's so popular.  The color is very similar to my lips, so it evens out my lips color and gives me the perfect nude lip.  If you're not a fan of nude lipsticks that are too light (like the color of your skin which wash you out or make your lips disappear), then this is the lipstick for you.  Because this has a matte consistency, be sure your lips are smooth and maybe even wear a moisturizing lip balm underneath the lipstick.  The matte finish makes this look very natural.

name: Bri
review: I like that lipstick, wanted to try that color but realized it was too bright for me...

name: Kitty Cat
review: Kind of drying and clumpy.

name: Lakki
review: I really love matte lipsticks hence I bought the whole range of Revlon Matte lipsticks but I am very disappointed. The application enhances your lines on lips even more. I started applying lipgloss so that lips looks smoother which is of no use buying a matte lipstick.They Wear off very easily.  But I love the colors Smoked peach, Mauve it Over, Sky Pink.

name: Pink Pout
review: Pink Pout by Revlon is the perfect pink.  It looks good on my yellow based skin tone and my friend who has reddish hair and ruddy skin also looks good in it.  Good with liner for daytime and liner and gloss for nighttime.  It is not long lasting so that is the only drawback.  However, the color is perfect.  Too bad they do not make it in another long lasting formula.

name: Marie
review: Wouldn't recommend this product, too dull looking.

name: ev
review: This product in the magazines looked very good on the models but not in real life.

name: LadyBug
review: My daughter and I use the same color. We both love it!

name: Debbie
review: Love the color pigment. Matte finish.

name: kim
review: i felt it wasn't as moist as the revlon lipstick i use daily

name: NS
review: I did not like the product as its not true to color and is drying.

name: KRZ
review: I did not like the color of this product at all. I was expecting a nude color and the product was actually more like a yellow or orange, and it looked hideous when on my face. It looked like I had yellow/orange lips. I would not recommend this product to someone with medium-tone skin like myself.

name: jlb
review: This is a beautiful matte lipstick....sort of a nude pink color that would probably look good on everyone!

name: Sam
review: Too orange for my skin

name: nikki
review: The color was horribly off from the packaging. And to top it off the lipstick was super dry and clumpy looking. I do not love this at all.

name: shae
review: Really like the color pay off, the texture and goes on and wears off evenly. It's a great Mac dupe! It can be a bit drying so recommend a balm before application.

name: Zee93
review: I love the color. It's my favorite shade of pink. However, you have to moisturize and exfoliate your lips so much before wearing this. Yes, I understand it's matte, but it's like super matte. Makes your lips look very flaky. But other than that, I love it.

name: marii
review: This color looks darker than it really is, but I am loving mauve it over it gives that natural looking lip, I use it with chap stick under with no gloss because I did buy it for the matte look. I love the way it glides on easily the color I don't feel there is anything negative about it.

name: texasbighair
review: I wanted to do the Angelina Jolie nude lip look and tried several brands at twice the price. I found the perfect lipstick in Revlon matte 100.  Paired with their Color Burst lip gloss in 104, it is the perfect nude lip.  Love it.

name: MissAutumn
review: I have never been a lipstick person, EVER. I cant stand the smell and shimmery colors. I picked this up (Pink Pout) from a rec from a blogger i follow. I absolutely love it! It isnt glossy, its a perfect matte. There are no smells or tastes which helps me avoid headaches and it last. I loved it so much i went out and purchased a few more colors in the matte.

name: Carla Ann
review: I love this product. If you like Matte lipstick, you will love it too. The colors are amazing, it goes on easily, and you don't need a lip liner.

name: Hair.Crazy_06
review: it's a good color but not was i was looking for.

name: skinidippn
review: I picked it because of the brand and color, but was alittle disappointed once applied because the color was not true to the product indication.  I like it, just not true to color.

name: Maggie
review: Comparable to bare essentials lipstick which is $25. This one was [$]! I even received compliments on the color. You know red is the new color for lips or at least thats whats in the magazines

name: me
review: okkk

name: tp
review: Not at all what I had hoped. Ulta Lipstick is much better.

name: Olivia Jules
review: Easy, smooth, and pretty

name: SMASHMOUTH
review: Nude Attitude (Matte) is decent, especially when taking into consideration the price.  A true nude color, though not as spectacular as Smashbox's Be Legendary Lipstick in the incredibly opaque shade of Nylon Nude.  When first applied to my lips, Nude Attitude looks harsh, much like concealer; however, I find that the color warms up and becomes more natural looking a couple minutes after application.  The color saturation is quite good, quite opaque, and the lipstick has a surprisingly smooth and creamy texture for a matte shade.  For me, Nude Attitude's biggest downfall is that it just doesn't last that long after application.

name: Britt
review: Love this product, and the color selection! I'd suggest to anyone looking for a good matte lipstick at a good price.

name: Snow Leopard
review: Since it's matte, it is dry and settles into the creases of your lips. Do not use this with chapped lips. Some lip gloss over it definitely helps. I got it in Nude Attitude and am very pleased with the color.

name: Krissy
review: i dont like the look or the feel of this matt lipstick. its flat lookign and feels dry and cakey like. i much much prefer the other revlon lipstick. the golden container.

name: Carla
review: I saw "Mauve it over" on a friend and want to try, because I love Revlon lipsticks. I liked the texture, but I think this color looks better on a skin tone that is not as pale as mine.

name: Shazia
review: good for daily wear

name: Avery
review: This product comes in a great array of colors and the price is great too. I purchased Wine not, the color is nice for apply just a hint of color. Unfortunately, I found the product was not smooth or creamy enough to apply the lipstick for a dramatic look. I know that chapped lips play a  big part in lipstick and my lips were hydrated and exfoliated, the lipstick just lacked a more creamy texture at least in my opinion. Other than that the lipstick is great for everyday daytime makeup.

name: Taccora
review: Really red is an amazingly bright true red matte lipstick so remember to exfoliate and moisturizer before applying to prevent drying.  I like to deepen the color a bit with a dark red lip liner and then top it off with NYX's monte color matte cream lipstick.

name: Shellzzzz
review: The color is great! It's a great shade, however, I only have one con. It is a matte color, and it lives up to it's name a little too much. Sometimes it can be very dry. However, I overlook that, and I love it!

name: JLC
review: I really like these matte lipstick line. I recommend exfoliate your lip before use, and use lip balm before applied if you want a good matte finish.
